result.purpose: This folder is responsible for defining GitHub Actions workflows for various automation tasks related to CI/CD processes.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each YAML file defines a specific workflow for automation tasks, allowing for easy maintenance and scalability.

.github/workflows/check.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for security scanning on pull requests to the develop branch.

.github/workflows/dockerize.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for Dockerizing a mobile wallet manager.
side_effects: Triggers on push and pull request events
risks: Exposure of sensitive information if secrets are not managed properly

.github/workflows/golangci-lint.yml.purpose: Configuration file for golangci-lint GitHub Actions workflow

.github/workflows/sentry.yml.purpose: Defines a GitHub Actions workflow for Sentry release management.
